name: moon-flute
effect: Evolves Nebby into Lunala when used at the Altar of the Moone.
short_effect: Evolves Nebby into Lunala when used at the Altar of the Moone.

flavor_text_entries.sun-moon:
It is said that the tones it produces were offered
up as an expression of gratitude to the Legendary
Pokémon of the moon.
